title: LF mid laner g5+
body:
title says it all, looking for a mid laner for our ranked team, would prefer for you to be active 3-4 days a week, have teamspeak 3 and wanting to take ranked 5s serious, current ranked 5s team rank is bronze 1, but looking to improve alot and eager to climb and grind !

Team Line up - 
Top - ponitaax (s3)
Jungle - HuckleberryChill (g2)
Mid - none atm
ADC - kittehcommando (g4)
Support - lushmeow (g5)
Subs - kittehcommandoV2 (g4) , Yiroy Jenkins (s1) , kotsooo (g5)

if interest just add me in game and we'll try you out :)

P.S first time making a post xD

replies.body: Currently S1 was G5 till I ran into some bad teams (dcs and trolls the life of ranked) so I got deranked but I do play mid well with these champs {{champion:91}} {{champion:1}} {{champion:7}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:8}} and I'm currently learning {{champion:105}} {{champion:84}} {{champion:238}}
